posts.content: Vintage speed 23" quick shifter for sale, unused and unopened box, ( unwanted present ), stainless steel shaft with black knob, fits buses 1960 - 1967, full detail on the Vintage speed website, item number 155-795-50SPT. List price is £ 241.00 from VW Heritage, will sell for £ 190.00, free postage or can take to Brighton Breeze.
